TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public Class HttpTransportBindingElement Inherits TransportBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension
type HttpTransportBindingElement = class inherit TransportBindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension interface IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 表示用于指定 HTTP 传输以传输消息的绑定元素。

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify an HTTP transport for transmitting messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是创建实现 HTTP 传输协议的自定义绑定的起始点。The class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the HTTP transport protocol. HTTP 是用于互操作性用途的主要传输。HTTP is the primary transport used for interoperability purposes. 通过 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 以确保与其他非 WCF Web 服务堆栈的互操作性支持此传输。This transport is supported by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to ensure interoperability with other non-WCF Web services stacks. WCF 服务模型使用此类实现的工厂对象创建和接口。The WCF service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the and interfaces. 这些工厂对象反过来创建使用 HTTP 协议传输 SOAP 消息的通道和侦听器。These factory objects, in turn, create the channels and listeners that transmit SOAP messages using the HTTP protocol. 您可以通过设置此类的属性来配置此类创建的工厂，例如：、 和 。You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as , , and . 您还可以设置基类 上的属性，例如：、 和 。You can also set properties on the base class, , such as , , and . 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何以命令性方式使用 。The following code shows how to imperatively use the . [!code-csharp[S_Imperative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_imperative/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_Imperative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_imperative/vb/service.vb#1)] `HttpTransportBindingElement` 也可用于配置文件中，如下列配置所示。`HttpTransportBindingElement` can also be used in a configuration file as shown in the following configuration. ```xml ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示客户端是否接受 Cookie 并且对今后的请求传播它们。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

value.span: 如果接受 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cookies are allowed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了便于与 ASMX Web 服务进行交互，ASMX Web 服务会使用 Cookie 来确保服务器返回的 Cookie 可自动复制到今后对该服务发出的所有客户端请求。This property is provided as a convenience for interacting with ASMX Web services that use cookies to make sure that the cookies returned from the server are automatically copied to all future client requests for that service. ## Examples 下面的示例设置此属性，以便指示将来自服务器的所有 Cookie 复制到今后的客户端请求。The following example sets this property to indicate that all cookies from the server should be copied to future client requests. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBindingElement = new HttpBindingElement(); httpBindingElement.AllowCookies = true; ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为本地地址忽略代理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether proxies are ignored for local addresses.

value.span: 如果为本地地址忽略代理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if proxies are ignored for local addresses; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地地址是指位于本地 LAN 或 Intranet 上的地址。A local address is one that is on the local LAN or intranet. WCF 始终忽略代理，如果服务地址以开始`http://localhost`。WCF always ignores the proxy if the service address begins with `http://localhost`. 如果希望客户端在与同一台计算机上的服务通话时使用代理，则应使用主机名称而非 `localhost`。You should use the host name (rather than `localhost`) if you want clients to go through a proxy when talking to services on the same machine. ## Examples 下面的示例将此属性设置为在对绑定执行请求时使用。The following example sets this property to use when performing requests on the binding. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); httpBinding.BypassProxyOnLocal = true; ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否与服务终结点建立持久性连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make a persistent connection to a service endpoint.

value.span: 如果对服务终结点的请求应包含具有 值的连接 HTTP 标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the request to the service endpoint should contain a Connection HTTP header with the value ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `true` 以发送具有 `Keep-alive` 值的连接 HTTP 标头。Set this property to `true` to send a Connection HTTP header with the value `Keep-alive`. 客户端使用此属性来指示希望使用持久性连接。A client uses this property to indicate a preference for persistent connections. 当此属性为 `true` 时，如果服务终结点支持持久性连接，则客户端会建立与服务终结点的持久性连接。When this property is `true`, the connection that the client makes to a service endpoint is persistent if the service endpoint supports that. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置此属性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[PoxSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/poxsample/cs/client/httpclient.cs#1)]

member this.LegacyExtendedProtectionPolicy : obj with get, set
public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxBufferSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要使用的缓冲区的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 对于缓冲的消息，此值与 相同。

span.span: For buffered messages this value is the same as .

summary.span: 对于经过流处理的消息，此值为必须以缓冲模式读取的 SOAP 标头的最大大小。

span.span: For streamed messages, this value is the maximum size of the SOAP headers, which must be read in buffered mode.

value.span: 缓冲区的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于经过流处理的消息，如果消息标头的大小大于此属性，则会引发 。For streamed messages, if the size of the message headers is greater than this property, then a is thrown. 对于未经过流处理的消息，如果消息的大小大于此属性，则会丢弃该消息。For a non-streamed message, if the message size is greater than this property, then the message is dropped. 如果没有指定，则此默认值为 65536。If not specified, this defaults to 65536. ## Examples 下面的示例将此属性设置为在对绑定执行请求时使用。The following example sets this property to use when performing requests on the binding. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); httpBinding.MaxBufferSize = 16384; ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPendingAccepts { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPendingAccepts : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置服务可以同时接受的最大连接数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections the service can accept simultaneously.

value.span: 服务可以同时接受的最大连接数。

span.span: The maximum number of connections the service can accept simultaneously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 0，这意味着 WCF 将为你配置值。The default value of is 0, which means WCF will configure the value for you. 您可以增加更好的可伸缩性的数量。You can increase the number for better scalability. 在自承载情况下，此属性控制并发 BeginGetContext 调用 WCF 将调用的最大数目。In the self-hosted case, this property controls the maximum number of simultaneous BeginGetContext calls WCF will invoke. 每次 BeginGetContext 调用一些内存被固定缓冲托管堆中。Each time BeginGetContext is called some memory is pinned within the managed heap for buffering. 如果过多的缓冲区已固定，可能会导致过多的堆碎片。If too many buffers are pinned, excessive heap fragmentation may result. 在 web 承载情况下将忽略此属性。This property is ignored in the web-hosted case.

member this.Realm : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证领域。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication realm.
The authentication realm.
The default value is "".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器使用领域对受保护的资源进行分区；每个分区可以拥有其各自的身份验证方案或授权数据库。Servers use realms to partition protected resources; each partition can have its own authentication scheme or authorization database. 领域仅用于基本和摘要式身份验证。Realms are used only for basic and digest authentication. 在客户端成功进行身份验证之后，该身份验证对给定领域内的所有资源都有效。After a client successfully authenticates, the authentication is valid for all resources in a given realm. 有关领域的详细说明，请参阅[RFC 2617](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=95943)。For a detailed description of realms, see [RFC 2617](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=95943).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于对基址验证绑定。This property is used to validate bindings against base addresses. ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定方案输出至控制台。The following example outputs the scheme of the binding to the console. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); Console.WriteLine("The scheme of the binding is {0}.",httpBinding.Scheme); ``` 输出为：“绑定方案为 http”。The output is: "The scheme of the binding is http."

summary.span: 导出有关绑定的自定义策略断言。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法写入到 WSDL 信息与绑定相关的语句特定协定公开和使用由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 以通知客户端绑定堆栈中的此自定义绑定元素存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 此方法接受两个参数： 和 对象。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 使用 , 和 方法以获取从不同范围导出的策略断言的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 然后，使用此方法将您自己的策略断言添加到适当的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 属性可公开正在导出的终结点的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 这样，此方法就可正确限定它们的导出策略断言的范围。This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，代码中的安全属性可以将行为添加到指示安全策略断言应该添加到的位置的 。For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 一旦将自定义策略断言附加到 WSDL 信息，客户端就可以通过实现 接口来检测和导入自定义绑定断言。Once custom policy assertions have been attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.

span.span: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::TransferMode TransferMode { System::ServiceModel::TransferMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::TransferMode value); };
member this.TransferMode : System.ServiceModel.TransferMode with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置传输模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the transfer mode.
One of the following member values of :
- Buffered
- Streamed
- StreamedRequest
- StreamedResponse

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定`StreamedRequest` = Streamed，表示 `StreamedResponse` 和 两个值。Specifying = Streamed implies both `StreamedRequest` and `StreamedResponse`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在服务器上启用不安全连接共享。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Unsafe Connection Sharing is enabled on the server.

summary.span: 如果启用，将对每个 TCP 连接执行一次 NTLM 身份验证。

span.span: If enabled, NTLM authentication is performed once on each TCP connection.

value.span: 如果启用不安全连接共享，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Unsafe Connection Sharing is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` 且使用 NTLM 对特定连接上的第一个请求进行身份验证，则会使用初始请求 中的身份验证信息来处理同一连接上的后续请求。When this property is set to `true` and the first request over a particular connection is authenticated using NTLM, subsequent requests over the same connection are processed using the authentication information in of the initial request. 此属性在 NTLM 不是身份验证协议时无效。This property has no effect when NTLM is not the authentication protocol. > [!NOTE] > 将此属性设置为 `true` 时不会发送其他 NTLM 身份验证质询，因此会提高性能，但是由于不要求所有请求都提供身份验证信息，所以存在安全风险。While setting this property to `true` increases performance because additional NTLM authentication challenges are not sent, there is a security risk in not requiring all requests to provide authentication information. 必须确定为提高性能冒此风险是否值得。You must determine whether the increase in performance is worth this risk. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例设置该属性以启用不安全连接共享。The following example sets the property to enable Unsafe Connection Sharing. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); httpBinding.AuthenticationScheme = AuthenticationSchemes.Ntlm; httpBinding.UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication = true; ```
